id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for this component.



*See also: [rdm6300 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/rdm6300.html#configuration-variables)*

on_tag.docs:
**[Automation](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#automation)**: An automation to perform when a tag is read. See [on_tag](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/rdm6300.html#rdm6300-on-tag).



*See also: [rdm6300 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/rdm6300.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) if you want to use multiple UART buses.



*See also: [rdm6300 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/rdm6300.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [rdm6300 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/rdm6300.html#id1)*

uid.docs:
**int**: The unique ID of the NFC/RFID tag.



*See also: [rdm6300 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/rdm6300.html#id1)*
